description:
Description of bug:

smoketests/base.py depends on paramiko, which is not installed in the venv.

$ grep -n paramiko smoketests/base.py
23:import paramiko

This will generate errors like the following when attempting to run the smoketests.


Steps to reproduce:

$ cd smoketests; python run_tests.py
nose.selector: INFO: /Users/justinshepherd/Projects/bzr/nova/trunk/smoketests/proxy.sh is executable; skipped
Failure
    runTest                                                     ERROR
    runTest                                                     ERROR
    runTest                                                     ERROR

======================================================================
ERROR: Failure: ImportError (No module named paramiko)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/justinshepherd/Projects/bzr/nova/trunk/.nova-venv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nose/loader.py", line 390, in loadTestsFromName
    addr.filename, addr.module)
  File "/Users/justinshepherd/Projects/bzr/nova/trunk/.nova-venv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nose/importer.py", line 39, in importFromPath
    return self.importFromDir(dir_path, fqname)
  File "/Users/justinshepherd/Projects/bzr/nova/trunk/.nova-venv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nose/importer.py", line 86, in importFromDir
    mod = load_module(part_fqname, fh, filename, desc)
  File "/Users/justinshepherd/Projects/bzr/nova/trunk/smoketests/test_admin.py", line 34, in <module>
    from smoketests import base
  File "/Users/justinshepherd/Projects/bzr/nova/trunk/smoketests/base.py", line 23, in <module>
    import paramiko
ImportError: No module named paramiko
title: paramiko not installed in venv, required by smoketests/base.py

Description of bug:

smoketests/base.py depends on paramiko, which is not installed in the venv.

$ grep -n paramiko smoketests/base.py
23:import paramiko

This will generate errors like the following when attempting to run the smoketests.


Steps to reproduce:

$ cd smoketests; python run_tests.py
nose.selector: INFO: /Users/justinshepherd/Projects/bzr/nova/trunk/smoketests/proxy.sh is executable; skipped
Failure

    runTest                                                     ERROR
    runTest                                                     ERROR

======================================================================

  File "/Users/justinshepherd/Projects/bzr/nova/trunk/.nova-venv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nose/importer.py", line 39, in importFromPath
    return self.importFromDir(dir_path, fqname)
  File "/Users/justinshepherd/Projects/bzr/nova/trunk/.nova-venv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nose/importer.py", line 86, in importFromDir
